code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,Link}from'react-router-dom';import ProjectList from'./components/ProjectList';import AddProject from'./components/AddProject';import EditProject from'./components/EditProject';import Login from'./components/Login';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(!!localStorage.getItem('token'));const handleLogin=()=>{setIsLoggedIn(true);};const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');setIsLoggedIn(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Router,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83D\uDCC1 Proje Y\xF6netim Sistemi"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Projeler"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/add",children:"Proje Ekle"})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"container",children:isLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,style:{float:'right'},children:"\xC7\u0131k\u0131\u015F Yap"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectList,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/add",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddProject,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/edit/:id",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EditProject,{})})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{onLogin:handleLogin})})]});}export default App;
